front.title: Extensions to the Path Computation Element Protocol(PCEP) Management Information Base(MIB) Module

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes extensions to the managed objects for modeling of the Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) for communications between a Path Computation Client (PCC) and a Path Computation Element (PCE), or between two PCEs, that support stateful capabilities.
